title: Blast
description:
Description :
        "Even if I'm not faced with talent, I'll always be facing the music."Unable to become a member of his middle school's Wind Orchestra Club, Harumitsu joins Tosaka High School, a school renowned for its Wind Orchestra Club. Surrounded by warm-hearted but strict upperclassmen as well as peers with strong-personalities, Harumitsu's talent blossoms!Dreams, setbacks, camaraderie... an exhilarating story filled with everything about wind orchestras starts with a blast!!!!
